OrgName.entry: BOYS BRIGADE, SHEFFIELD AND DISTRICT BATTALION, THE

Desc.entry: Administrative organisation for the 15 companies working with boys aged 5-18 years. Each company provides activities for young people, including badge work, games and outdoor activities in a safe, fun environment. A registered charity run by volunteers all with an enhanced CRB check.

ContactName.entry: Mrs S M Cowie, Battalion Secretary

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
